title: H is for Hawk - purpose of text

content.prompt: The primary purpose of the passage is to

choices.label: claim that people should observe hawks more closely
persuade the reader to become a hawk trainer
explain a technique essential to hawk training
lament that hawks are often misunderstood

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
